text:
Mr. Marshall Gunselman
Audio-Visual Director
David Lipscomb College
Nashville 5, Tennessee
Dear Mr. GunselmanÂ«
I have received your letter of May 18 with submission forms for the
series LIPSCOMB CHAPEL SINGING. Thank you very much for submitting
this series..
The submission forms and the audition tapes will be forwarded to the
Acceptance Subcommittee as soon as the tapes are received. As soon
as all the votes are in, I shall inform you as to whether or not the
series has been accepted for distribution.
Thank you again for your interest in the Network.
Sincerely,
REUtjy
Robert E. Underwood, Jr
Network Manager
